<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acefe92adee8725ad904c7c43649790e8">llvm::BasicBlockSection</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codegen/#ac72192305c89532b4469f8533b6ecf5b"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codegen/#ac72192305c89532b4469f8533b6ecf5b">codegen::getBBSectionsMode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetoptions">llvm::TargetOptions</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
